Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Karlov
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski, 67th, Cicero, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Karlov.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski, 67th, Cicero, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Karlov.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink and Green Line Trains bypassing Ashland/Lake
